merge_cond_scatter=lapply(merge_cond_split, function(x) ggplot(x, aes(x = effect.size.x, y = effect.size.y)) +
  geom_point(color = "blue", size = 3) +
  labs(title = "effect size",
       x = "t2d_2",

  theme_minimal())
